name: Nikhil Yadav
bio: A driven BCA student with a passion for technology and fluency in multiple programming languages, I thrive at the intersection of creativity and code. Skilled in languages like Python, Java, and JavaScript, I love tackling complex challenges and building innovative solutions. My curiosity fuels my desire to learn, and I’m always exploring new tools and technologies. When I’m not coding, you can find me collaborating on exciting projects or sharing my knowledge with fellow tech enthusiasts.
